:::{#thm-d_odds_d_beta}

::: notes
To derive $\derivf{\odds}{\vb}$,
we can apply the vector chain rule (@thm-chain-vec) again
along with @thm-d_omega-d_eta and @lem-d_eta_d_vb:
:::

$$
\ba
\derivf{\odds}{\vb}
&= \red{\derivf{\eta}{\vb}} \blue{\derivf{\odds}{\logodds}}
\\
&= \red{\vx} \blue{\odds}
\ea
$$

:::

:::{#cor-d_odds_d_beta}

$$
\ba
\derivf{\odds}{\vb}
&= \red{\vx} \frac{\pi}{1-\pi}
\ea
$$

:::
